I resolved my issue. Shouldn't have provided an absolute path.

--- In nea=
t@yahoogroups.com, "delodic" <rbk600@...> wrote:
>
> I've been working on t=
his project to research the influence of substrate topology on a learn-to-r=
ace task. 
>

rked fine, gives problems. 
>

rties file:
>

>  * loads properties from file

 file in the application classpath

> public =
void loadFromResourceWithoutLogging( String resource ) throws IOException {=

ied downloading the original ahni package again, and trying to run one of t=
